db:select.db:sql: select * from restaurant where name like :restaurantname LIMIT :mylimit OFFSET :myoffset
db:select.db:input-parameters: #[%dw 2.0 var pageSize = (vars.pageSize default 2) as Number var page = vars.page default 1 as Number --- { restaurantname: '%' ++ (vars.name default " " as String) ++ "%", mylimit: pageSize default 2 as Number, myoffset: (page -1)* (pageSize) as Number }]

db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{ name: payload.name as String, housenumber: payload.address.houseNumber as String, street: payload.address.street as String, city: payload.address.city as String, pincode: payload.address.pincode as String }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- {restaurant_id : payload.generatedKeys.GENERATED_KEY} ++ vars.originalPayload as Object default {}

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { location: vars.requestUri as String ++ '/' ++ (payload.generatedKeys.GENERATED_KEY as String) default "" }
